description:
Description: In this self-paced, video-based course you will learn best practices for getting started using Adobe Captivate 5.5, as well as how to get the most out of recording and editing software simulations.

Content: The course includes at least 12 videos and roughly 2 hours of content.

Why take this course? These videos will help you master your skills in developing software simulations in Adobe Captivate.
title: Software Simulations with Adobe Captivate 5.5
